name: customelements
description: ## To create a new component Run the generate component script with the name of the component as a parameter. _Use camelCase to avoid issues_. ```shell script generate-component.sh button ``` The command above will create a directory called Button, set up npm,  and generate the boilerplate for a component.

scripts.build: npm run buildButton && npm run buildCheckbox && npm run buildInput && npm run buildRadioButton && npm run buildRadioButtonGroup && npm run buildRipple && npm run buildSidebar
